statements: UPDATE suppliers SET supplier_name = 'Supplier A', contact_person = 'John Doe' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET email = 'info@supplierb.com', phone_number = '555-555-5555' WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier B';
UPDATE suppliers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', contact_person = 'John Doe', payment_terms = 'Net 30' WHERE supplier_id = 100
UPDATE suppliers SET phone_number = '(123) 456-7890', contract_details = '{"contract_number": "12345", "start_date": "2022-05-01"}' WHERE supplier_id = 200
UPDATE supplier_contacts SET contact_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE contract_details SET contract_value = 15000.00, contract_end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE supplier_contacts SET contact_person_name = 'John Doe', contact_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE contract_details SET contract_value = 15000.00, contract_end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND contract_id = 101;
UPDATE supplier_contacts SET supplier_name = 'Best Suppliers Inc.', email = 'info@bestsuppliers.com' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE contract_details SET terms = 'Net 30' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE supplier_contacts SET supplier_name = 'ABC Corp', email = 'abc@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE contract_details SET terms = 'Net 30', contract_amount = 15000.50 WHERE contract_id = 100;
UPDATE suppliers SET name='New Supplier Name', email='newemail@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE contracts SET total_value=5000.00, end_date='2023-12-31' WHERE contract_id=101;
UPDATE suppliers SET name = 'Updated Supplier Name', email = 'updated@email.com' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE contracts SET total_value = 15000.75, start_date = '2022-04-01' WHERE contract_id = 101
UPDATE supplier_contact SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE contract_details SET contract_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE contract_id = 2;
UPDATE supplier_contact SET contact_person = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE payment_terms SET payment_due_date = '2022-08-31', payment_amount = 5000.00 WHERE contract_id = 10;
